channel.description: Recent changes in Reservation Management on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Hotel-X: Booking List
item.description:
The Booking operation allows to retrieve a booking (or bookings) with all its details from the booking reference locator. The most important information returned for each booking in the list is: - Booking reference - Booking holder - Booking pax - Hotel, rooms and boards confirmed - Booking rates Advanced criteria Explain different parameters can be set up on the request (indicate which ones are mandatory) How to request a5b25332a7a5683d602efeb87233a9c7 You can ask for bookings by client reference (XTG-XXXXXX) or by supplier reference.
[...]
